name: SubstanceSourceMaterial.organism.author.authorDescription
title: SubstanceSourceMaterial.organism.author.authorDescription
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: The author of an organism species shall be specified. The author year of an organism shall also be specified when applicable; refers to the year in which the first author(s) published the infraspecific plant/animal name (of any rank)
element.definition: The author of an organism species shall be specified. The author year of an organism shall also be specified when applicable; refers to the year in which the first author(s) published the infraspecific plant/animal name (of any rank).
